text: @SenatorCollins Blah Blah Blah. Less of your nonsense would be helpful. You & other Republicans have blood on your hands...from the over 100,000 deaths from COVID-19 to White Supremacists who think it's open season on Black people. Trump enables these heinous acts. You are complicit. You all are
